page.title: 02PUBS AND CLUBS IN HATFIELD
page.content: THE 3 PUBS IN HATFIELD ARE THE 'BAY HORSE','INGRAM ARMS' AND 'BLUE BELL'.ALL THE PUBS ARE OPEN EVERY DINNER AND NIGHT.THE INGRAM ARMS AND BAY HORSE OFFER FULL A' LA CARTE MENU'S AND BAR MEALS.THE PUBS HAVE FRUIT MACHINES,ARCADE GAMES,DUKE BOXES AND POOL TABLES,SOME INCLUDE SNOOKER AND DART TEAMS.THE COST OF A PINT OF BEER IS 68p.THIS IS EITHER JOHN SMITHS OR DARLEYS.THE MAXIMUM CAPACITY IS 120. THE CLUBS ARE 'COUNTRY CLUB' AND 'HATFIELD GRANGE'.BOTH OFFER FULL A'LA CARTE MENUS AND BAR SNACKS.A MEAL WOULD COST FROM Â£5-Â£8:50.BOTH OF THE CLUBS ARE OPEN ON WEEKDAYS BUT THE BUSIEST TIME IS SUNDAY.THE COUNTRY CLUB OFFERS A DISCO AND STAR CABARET. THESE CLUBS ARE FOR MEMBERS ONLY BUT THERE ARE A FEW NON-MEMBERS EVENINGS. {
